titleStmt.title: Christians liberty to the Lords table, discovered by eight arguments, therby proving, that the Sacrament of the body and blood of our Lord, doth as well teach to grace, as strengthen and confirm grace, and so is common, as well to the outward Christian as to the inward Christian: occasioned by the contrary doctrine, taught by a strange minister in Woolchurch, on the 29th of June last. / By I.G a parishioner there. Imprimatur, James Cranford.
titleStmt.author: Graunt, John, of Bucklersbury.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Robinson, and are to be sold at the three Pigeons in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three Pigeons in Pauls Churchyard
